Name: Halve
Description: Cutting an arbitrary (food) object into 2 halves

Name: Hold
Description: Holding an object firmly in its gripper

Name: Place-Down
Description: Placing the held object at a location

Name: Pour
Description: Pouring the content of one container into another container

Name: Slice
Description: Cutting an arbitrary (food) object into one small and one big slice

Name: Wipe
Description: Cleaning a surface using some kind of towel
